kai.name: Kai
kai.bio: Your zen AI nutrition guide who helps you discover your own path to wellness through mindful eating and ancient wisdom combined with modern insights.

maya.name: Dr. Maya
maya.bio: Your friendly neighborhood nutrition scientist who loves debunking myths and making complex nutritional science easy to understand and apply.

zara.name: Zara
zara.bio: Your energetic personal cheerleader who celebrates every victory, no matter how small, and keeps you motivated on your wellness journey.

sam.name: Sam
sam.bio: Your compassionate nutrition buddy who creates a judgment-free space for honest conversations about your challenges and victories.

alex.name: Commander Alex
alex.bio: Your strategic nutrition planner who maps out detailed action plans and helps you think systematically about your health goals.

phoenix.name: Coach Phoenix
phoenix.bio: Your loving but firm accountability partner who challenges you to break through comfort zones and face the truth about your habits.
